definitions.definition: to cook lightly by browning via direct exposure to a fire or other heat source
examples: We used to enjoy toasting marshmallows around the campfire.

definitions.definition: to cook lightly by browning under a grill or in a toaster ; to grill
examples: Top with cheese and toast under the grill for a few minutes.

definitions.definition: To engage in a salutation , often with raising of the drinking vessel , while drinking an alcoholic beverage in honor of someone or something.
examples: We toasted the happy couple many times over the course of the evening.
You all have achieved so much together thus far, so I think that deserves a toast! Let's toast !
I toasted my feet by the fire.

definitions.definition: To perform an extemporaneous narrative poem or rap .

main_definition: ( transitive ) to cook lightly by browning via direct exposure to a fire or other heat source
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive , specifically ) to cook lightly by browning under a grill or in a toaster ; to grill
( ambitransitive ) To engage in a salutation , often with raising of the drinking vessel , while drinking an alcoholic beverage in honor of someone or something.
( music , slang , Jamaica ) To perform an extemporaneous narrative poem or rap .
